artefact.overview: Building a new marina in waters owned or managed by British Waterways
artefact.licence_short_description: Contact British Waterways to build a new marina in England, Scotland or Wales.
artefact.licence_overview:
If you want to build a marina that connects to waters owned or managed by [British Waterways](http://www.britishwaterways.co.uk/ "British Waterways"){:rel="external"} you need to get permission from British Waterways.

A fee will be payable and terms and conditions will apply.

apply.description: New Marina Application — Application for a new marina
